entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
